name: Indian Curry
instructions: Fry onion in butter until soft. Add cumin, coriander, ginger, garlic, and cashews until lightly browned. Add tomatoes, tumeric, and paprika and cook a few seconds. Blend everything with a little stock to make a paste. Cook chicken until cooked through, the add potatoes, carrots, cauliflower, and stock, reserving some stock to rinse out the blender. Simmer 5-10 minutes until vegetables are softened. Add blended gravy and simmer a few minutes. Then add peas, raisins, and garam masala and simmer a few more minutes. Finally add kasoori methi and simmer just a little and serve with cilantro.
